column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I can't cover everything they had at the art institute
column2: but they had a surprising gathering of paintings from artists like Monet
column11: Gauguin... and that's about where my art knowledge runs out. They have the famous Seurat Sunday on La Grande Jatte
column13: American Gothic by Grant Wood. There were so may other artists with interesting work
column14: I could have easily spent another 3-4 hours wandering through the halls.
